Summary

I am a Sydney-based software and web developer with five years industry experience. With a wide range of skills in front end and back end web development, I have worked in a number of different projects for a variety of clients. My specialties include open source and web technologies, such as Perl/Python/Ruby, JavaScript/jQuery, MySQL/PostgreSQL and Linux. Moreover, I always keep an open mind and am eager to learn new technologies to enhance my career and professional growth.
